modules.description: Handles real-time audio streaming protocol interactions, including connection setup, metadata updates, and data transmission over TCP. Operates with byte buffers, socket connections, and protocol-specific message structures. Used to implement audio source clients that broadcast to icecast or shoutcast servers.

This module handles low-level network operations for establishing and managing streaming audio connections to IceCast and ShoutCast servers, focusing on socket-level interactions and protocol-specific configurations. It works with socket descriptors, connection objects, metadata, and audio data to facilitate tasks like sending streams, closing connections, and updating metadata. Use cases include real-time audio broadcasting, manual metadata injection, and handling HTTP or Icy protocol requirements.
